Comments_List: This course helped very much. I have gained many translation tools, knowledges, and method, which makes me never be afraid of translating. I gained study method as well. This is my first semester at Yale graduate school, I did not even know how to prepare for graduate class. This course helped mw with that and offered me long-term method for study.
Nothing needed. To me, it was really great because I learned a lot.
I would recommend this course to anyone who interested in China and Chinese history. This is a course with helpful method any sinologist will need.
